contentList:
Death Knight A thousand atrocities are etched in the eyes of every Death Knight, and foes who gaze into them too long will feel the warmth pulled from their bodies, replaced with cold steel. Frost sharpens their strikes; blood fortifies their bodies; and undeath allows them to erupt in unholy rage in the heat of battle.
Blood Blood death knights are dark guardians who manipulate and corrupt life energy to sustain themself in the face of an enemy onslaught. Frost Frost death knights are harbingers of doom, channeling runic power and delivering vicious weapon strikes. Unholy Unholy death knights are masters of death and decay, spreading infection and controlling undead minions to do their bidding.
Blood Rune Frost Rune Unholy Rune Runes are required for casting most of the Death Knight's abilities. A Death Knight has various means to replenish runes during the combat. Runic Power Runic Power is used for specific Death Knight abilities and can be refilled through most of the Death Knight's skills. Unless modified by other abilities, your melee attack has a 15% chance to replenish 20 Runic Power.
Blood Rune: 1 Frost Rune: 1 Unholy Rune: 1 You obtained a Death Knight rune and now possess the ability to invoke the power within it. Runic Power: [1] Your weapon is now infused with runic power, enabling it to envoke the might of a Death Knight. Harbinger of the Scourge You gain immunity to all diseases.
Dominates the target undead creature, forcing it to do your bidding. Death Coil Fires a blast of unholy energy at the target, causing [1] to an enemy or healing an Undead ally for [2].
Casting Death Coil has a [3] chance to regenerate an Unholy Rune under Unholy Subclass. Death Grip Harnesses the energy that surrounds and binds all matter, drawing the target toward you. Enemy pulled will be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STUNNED">Stunned</LSTag> for 1 turn. Raise Dead Raises a ghoul to fight by your side. You can have one ghoul at a time. Death Pact Sacrifices an undead minion, healing the Death Knight for [1] of maximum health. Chains of Ice Shackles the target with frozen chains. Reducing movement by [1], and afflicting with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHILLED">Chilled</LSTag> for 2 turns. Movement is reduced by [1]. Anti-Magic Shell Surrounds the Death Knight in an Anti-Magic Shell, absorbing 50% magical damage dealt by harmful spells. Magical Damage absorbed by Anti-Magic Shell energizes the Death Knight with additional [1] runic power. Lasts [2] turns. Absorbing magical damage dealt by harmful spells. Magical Damage absorbed by Anti-Magic Shell energizes the Death Knight with additional [1] runic power. Mind Freeze Smash the target's mind with cold, preventing any spell from being cast for [1] turns, and infects <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHILLED">Chilled</LSTag> for 2 turns. This Entity is silenced. Rune Tap Immediately converts [1] health into [2] Runic Power. Raise Ally Pours dark energy into a dead target, reuniting spirit and body to allow the target to reenter battle with [1] of max health. Death's Advance Embrace the power of the Shadowlands, and teleport to the target location. Death and Decay Corrupts the targeted ground, slowing down all targets within the area and dealing damage by [1] of their maximum health over 10 turns. Horn of Winter The Death Knight blows the Horn of Winter, increasing total Strength and Dexterity of all allies within 12m by [1]. Lasts 10 turns. Increases total Strength and Dexterity by [1].
Blood Plague A shadowy disease that drains [1] health from the target each turn and makes the target frenzied, directing its aggression toward you. Frost Fever A disease dealing [1] every turn and reduce movement speed by 4.5m. Virulent Plague A disease that deals [1] every turn. It erupts when the infected target dies and spreads to nearby enemies within. Festering Wound A pustulent lesion that stacks up to 6 times and will burst when damaged by certain abilities, dealing [1] and generating [2] Runic Power per stack bursted. Enemies infected with Festering Wound will burst a small [3] AOE when they die.
Mastery: Frozen Heart Your attacks have a [1] independent <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> chance against <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHILLED">Chilled</LSTag> targets. Applying <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHILLED">Chilled</LSTag> on a target also infect <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DK_FrostFever">Frost Fever</LSTag> for 2 turns. Empower Runic Weapon: Frost The runic power in your weapon is further strengthend. Melee weapon attacks deal an additional [1], and the chance to replenish Runic Power is increased to [2]. Killing Machine Your weapon attack has a [1] chance to make your next <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Obliterate">Obliterate</LSTag> a critical strike and refund 1 Frost Rune, or your next <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_HowlingBlast">Howling Blast</LSTag> free. Your next <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Obliterate">Obliterate</LSTag> is a critical strike and refund 1 Frost Rune, or your next <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_HowlingBlast">Howling Blast</LSTag> is free.
Frost Strike Frost Strike: Reaction On a hit with a melee weapon, deal additional [1]. Your Frost Strike has a [2] chance to restore 1 Frost Rune, and this chance raises to 100% on a critical hit. Frost Strike Critical: Reaction On a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> with a melee weapon, deal additional [1] and restore 1 Frost Rune. Obliterate Perform a melee attack with both your mainhand and offhand weapons, dealing [1] weapon damage for each weapon and an additional [2].
Obliterate regenerates [3] Runic Power on hit, and this effect is doubled on a critical hit. Howling Blast Blast the target with a frigid wind, dealing [1] to the target and nearby enemies, infecting <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHILLED">Chilled</LSTag> for 2 turns. Howling Blast regenerates [2] Runic Power on hit. Howling Blast: Reaction React to your next attacker with a blast of frigid wind, dealing [1] to the target and nearby enemies, infecting <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHILLED">Chilled</LSTag> for 2 turns. Your Howling Blast restores [2] Runic Power on hit Breath of Sindragosa Infects <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHILLED">Chilled</LSTag> and deal [1] to enemies in a cone in front of you. You can recast this spell again this turn until your Runic Power is exhausted.
Generates 2 Frost Runes after each cast.
Mastery: Dreadblade Your Ghoul summoned by Raise Dead lasts longer and grows stronger as you level. Your Ghoul's attack now deals additional [1] and spreads <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DK_UnholyFever">Virulent Plague</LSTag>.
You and your Ghoul's necrotic damage has a [2] chance to infect a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DK_FesteringWound">Festering Wound</LSTag>. Empower Runic Weapon: Unholy Sudden Doom Your weapon attack has a [1] chance to make your next <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_DeathCoil">Death Coil</LSTag> free and bursts all <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DK_FesteringWound">Festering Wound</LSTag>s on the target. Your next <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_DeathCoil">Death Coil</LSTag> also generating an additional Unholy Rune on hit. Your next <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_DeathCoil">Death Coil</LSTag> is free and burst all <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DK_FesteringWound">Festering Wound</LSTag>s on the target. Generates an additional Unholy Rune on hit.
Scourge Strike Scourge Strike: Reaction An unholy strike that deals additional [2], and causes 1 <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DK_FesteringWound">Festering Wound</LSTag> to burst. On a hit with a melee weapon, deal additional [1], and causes 1 <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DK_FesteringWound">Festering Wound</LSTag> to burst. Scourge Strike Critical: Reaction On a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> with a melee weapon, deal additional [1] and causes 1 <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DK_FesteringWound">Festering Wound</LSTag> to burst. Outbreak Deals [1] and infects <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DK_UnholyFever">Virulent Plague</LSTag> to the target and all nearby enemies. Death Coil: Reaction React to your next attacker with a blast of unholy energy at the target, causing [1] to an enemy or healing an Undead ally for [2].
Death Coil has a [3] chance to regenerate an Unholy Rune under Unholy Subclass. Festering Strike Strikes the target with additional [1], and infects the target with 2-3 <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DK_FesteringWound">Festering Wounds</LSTag>. Claw the enemy, dealing [1] and infects <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DK_UnholyFever">Virulent Plague</LSTag> on hit. Claw has a [2] chance to knock <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag> the target. Army of the Dead Summons a legion of ghouls who swarms your enemies, fighting anything they can.
Mastery: Blood Shield Each time you heal yourself with <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_DeathStrike">Death Strike</LSTag>, you gain [1] of the amount healed as a damage absorption shield, stacks up to 25% maximum health.
When your <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="Buff_BloodShield">Blood Shield</LSTag> is active, hitten by enemies will cause a small AOE burst that deals Enemy Level + [2]. Gain <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">Temporary Hit Points</LSTag> equivalent to the stack of this effect. Hitten by enemies will cause a small AOE burst of [2]. Empower Runic Weapon: Blood Crimson Scourge Your weapon attacks on targets have a [1] chance to make your next <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_DeathDecay">Death and Decay</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_BloodBoil">Blood Boil</LSTag> free and you can recast Death and Decay.
Alternatively, your next <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_DeathStrike">Death Strike</LSTag> deals additional force damage based on your <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="Buff_BloodShield">Blood Shield</LSTag> amount. Your next <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_DeathDecay">Death and Decay</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_BloodBoil">Blood Boil</LSTag> is free and you can recast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_DeathDecay">Death and Decay</LSTag>.
Alternatively, your next <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_DeathStrike">Death Strike</LSTag> deals additional force damage based on your <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="Buff_BloodShield">Blood Shield</LSTag> amount and generates an additional Blood Rune.
Heart Strike Instantly strike the target with your weapon, causing additional [1]. This effect hits all enemies near the target and generate [2] Runic Power per hit while you remain in <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_DeathDecay">Death and Decay</LSTag>. Heart Strike: Reaction On a hit with a melee weapon, deal additional [1] on the target. This effect hits all enemies near the target and generate [2] Runic Power per hit while you remain in <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_DeathDecay">Death and Decay</LSTag>. Heart Strike Critical: Reaction On a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> with your weapon, causing additional [1] on the target. This effect hits all enemies near the target and generate [2] Runic Power per hit while you remain in <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_DeathDecay">Death and Decay</LSTag>. Heart Strike Counter: Reaction React to your next attacker with your weapon attack, causing additional [1] on the target. This effect hits all enemies near the target and generate [2] Runic Power per hit while you remain in <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_DeathDecay">Death and Decay</LSTag>.
Blood Boil Deals [1] and infects all enemies within [2] with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DK_BloodFever">Blood Plague</LSTag>. Death Strke Focuses dark power into a strike that deals additional [1] and heals you for 25% of damage taken last turn, minimum 10% of maximum health.
Death Strike hits have a 60% chance to generate 1 Blood Rune. This status indicates the amount of Death Strike healing as a result of damage taken from enemy attacks last turn. Resets on turn end. Gorefiend's Grasp Shadowy tendrils coil around all enemies within [1], pulling them to your location and deal [2]. Enemies pulled will be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STUNNED">Stunned</LSTag> for 1 turn.
Does not spend Blood Runes. Does not spend Frost Runes. Does not spend Unholy Runes. Does not spend Runic Power. Mainhand Weapon Damage increases to 100% when you are not dual wielding.
Maw of the Damned "The Maw's thirst is unquenchable. If it is not fed fresh victims, it will not hesitate to drink from its wielder instead." Insatiable Blade
Attacks from this weapon ignores Force Damage <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> and gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> towards targets infected with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DK_BloodFever">Blood Plague</LSTag>. Your weapon attacks gain additional [1] chance to proc <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Blood_CrimsonScourge">Crimson Scourge</LSTag>. Red Thirst
Your maximum <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="Buff_BloodShield">Blood Shield</LSTag> from <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Mastery_BloodShield">Mastery: Blood Shield</LSTag> increases to [1] MaxHP, and deals [2] increased damage while within <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_DeathDecay">Death and Decay</LSTag>. In addition, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_DeathStrike">Death Strike</LSTag> hits have a [3] chance to extend the duration of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DK_Buff_VampiricBlood">Vampiric Blood</LSTag> by 1. Vampiric Blood Embrace your undeath, increase your maximum health by [1] and gain 100% increased healing from <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_DeathStrike">Death Strike</LSTag>.
Frostreaper "When my days have come to an end, you shall be king." Icebringer "I will show you the justice of the grave... and the true meaning of fear." Inexorable Assult
While wielding both Frostreaper and Icebringer, your weapon attacks ignores Cold Damage <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> and gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> towards targets infected with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DK_FrostFever">Frost Fever</LSTag>. Your weapon attacks gain additional [1] chance to proc <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Frost_KillingMachine">Killing Machine</LSTag>, and your dual wielding attacks no longer consumes <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag>. (You still need at least 1 <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag> to trigger dual wielding attacks.) Cold-blooded Rage
While wielding both Frostreaper and Icebringer, you gain additional [1] <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> chance from <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Mastery_FrozenHeart">Mastery: Frozen Heart</LSTag>. Your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_FrostStrike">Frost Strike</LSTag> critical hit has a [2] chance to extend the duration of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DK_Buff_FrostPillar">Pillar of Frost</LSTag> by 1. Pillar of Frost The power of frost empowers you. Your Cold damage is increased by your Strength <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>. Each Frost Rune spent while Pillar of Frost is active further increases your Strength by an additional 1, up to 10 stacks. Your Cold damage is increased by your Strength <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>. Each Rune spent while Pillar of Frost is active further increases your Strength by an additional 1, up to 10 stacks. Your Strength is increased by [1] per stack of this effect, up to 10 stacks.
Apocolypse "It shall sow destruction and war. Famine and death. It shall tempt with power, and then bring an end to all life." Eternal Agony
Attacks from this weapon ignores Necrotic Damage <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> and gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> towards targets infected with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DK_UnholyFever">Virulent Plague</LSTag>. Your weapon attacks gain additional [1] chance to proc <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Unholy_SuddenDoom">Sudden Doom</LSTag>. Unholy Aura
You and your minions gain additional [1] <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DK_FesteringWound">Festering Wound</LSTag> proc chance from <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Mastery_DreadBlade">Mastery: Dreadblade</LSTag>. In addition, casting <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_DeathCoil">Death Coil</LSTag> has a [2] chance to extend the duration of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DK_Buff_DarkTransformation">Dark Transformation</LSTag> by 1. Dark Transformation Your Ghoul deals [1] to nearby enemies within [2] and transforms into a powerful undead monstrosity. Ghoul's abilities deal [3] more damage and take on new functions while the transformation is active. Your Ghoul is transformed into an undead monstrosity. Ghoul's abilities deal [1] more damage and take on new functions while the transformation is active. `
Sweeping Claws Rakes an enemy with deformed claws, dealing [1] to the target and nearby enemies and has a [2] chance to knock <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag> targets. Vile Contagion Inflict disease upon your enemies. Spreading <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DK_FesteringWound">Festering Wound</LSTag> equal to the amount currently active on your target to all nearby enemies within 5m.
Mark of Naxxramas The Four Horsemen are extremely powerful elite death knights originally created by the lich Kel'Thuzad to serve as his royal guard. The most feared and powerful soldiers of all the Scourge, the Archlich considered them his greatest creation. They are damned souls, shackled in anguish for eternity. Use this mark to challenge the avatars of the Four Horsemen, and you will be greatly rewarded. Thane Korth'azz Lady Blaumeux Sir Zeliek Lord Mograine
